name: Stranger (the kinetic novel) - Switcheroo Jam entry
name_original: Stranger (the kinetic novel) - Switcheroo Jam entry
description:
This is an entry for Switcheroo Jam. I chose a role of myself as an artist for a visual-driven game.

The story of this kinetic novel is based on a poem/drabble I wrote in a short period of time. If you are dissatisfied with the shaggy dog nature of an ending, then I apologize. I am only experimenting around with Ren'Py engine.

Musics:

sad boy with a laptop - im just trying to figure it out

Idealism - A Moment of Silence
